pageContext.claim: “One of the WORST governors in the USA. [Cuomo] Caused 11,000 deaths in nursing homes alone due to his bad moves and incompetence. At least he said I 'did a phenomenal job'. But he didn't!!!”
pageContext.analysis: At the time of this statement, according to the COVID Tracking Project, 6,624 people have died of covid-19 in nursing homes and other long-term care facilities in New York, accounting for 26 percent of the state’s 25,275 covid-19 deaths. So Trump's number is inflated. More broadly, while the issue is sharply debated, it unclear the extent to which the governor’s policy -- directing nursing homes in the state to accept patients who had or were suspected of having covid-19 -- was responsible for nursing home COVID-19 deaths.
